commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
# for MSSE Chem 274B - Fall Semester
# University of California, Berkeley
# 
# Creator: Joyce Kim Graduate Python
# Date Created: Dec 3, 2021
#
This is directory where all utilities are being commpiled.  Tests of these
utilities are in the ../tests subdirectory.   These utilities are also used
inside programs in the src directory.

PATH ROOT_DIR/utils
  Files:
	- README: this file with a general description of the utils subdirectory

	- Makefile: a makefile that can generate all objects and libraries assiciated with utilitary functions
	            (e.g. getting <key, value> pairs from the shell command line.) The make file can also clean
		    all utility objects in the ../lib directory
		    shell> make cleanall
		    or create all the utilities objects
		    shell> make all

       - utils.cxx: timing utility to yield times for each sorting algorithm tests and data structure
       	               shell command line
